jobs_results.title: Android Developer - Contract
jobs_results.description:
Android Developer - Contract

As an Android Developer, you will have the opportunity to build and lead solutions that engage millions of sports fans worldwide. Working with a wide range of data sources and frontend technologies, building custom UI experiences for sports fans. At Pulselive, we pride ourselves in providing a collaborative environment that ensures we produce leading products across web and native applications.
• Contractor
• Daily rate: 120,000 HUF - 160,000 HUF
• 3 Month Contract (Immediate Start)

Responsibilities
• Managing code releases to internal environments (Dev, Test)
• Producing code to a high standard that not only functions correctly but can be understood and extended by other members of the team
• Showing good attention to detail in the final product, taking care and pride in what is produced, ensuring others do the same
• Communicating clearly to ensure the best possible solutions are built

Skills
Expert knowledge of
• Object Oriented Programming
• Designing and architecting Android applications
• Reactive and functional programming (Rx, Coroutines, Flow etc.)
• Web service integration (REST, JSON etc.)
• GIT usage and code management
• Integrating with and using third party libraries/applications (e.g. video providers)
• Documenting Android solutions and code

Competent with
• Task/ticket management tools such as JIRA
• Persistent storage solutions
• CI/CD Solutions
• Kotlin Multiplatform
• Jetpack Compose
• Writing unit tests

Understanding of
• HTML, CSS
• Javascript
• Java for Android

jobs_results.title: Android developer (PRM)
jobs_results.description:
Key Responsibilities
Design and maintain high performance, reusable, and reliable code to develop advanced applications for the Android platformEnsure the best possible performance, quality, and responsiveness of the applicationWork in a team, quality checking own code, collaborating with Test Team and Project Management.Debug, fix and improve performance in existing software.Evaluate, suggest and implement new technologies to maximize development efficiencyCollaborate with app designer to define and ship new featuresImplement and create documentation and specifications

Qualifications
Software development experience with confident and extensive knowledge of Java and Kotlin.Proven working experience (2+ years) in Android app developmentKnowledge of object-oriented development techniques, mobile architectures, trends, and new technologiesExperience in creating modern graphical user interfaces (GUIs) for Android.Practical knowledge of Android development environments (Android Studio).Self-motivated, with a proactive approach to work.Working proficiency in English.

Preferred Skills
Strong knowledge of Android UI design principles, patterns, and best practicesExperience in development for platforms other than Android.Basic knowledge of web based technologies (HTTP, REST, Json, Xml).Critical thinking with attitude to problem-solvingGood time-management, interpersonal and communication skills

AMIT KÍNÁLUNK:

Céginfó

jobs_results.title: Junior/Medior Android developer (Kotlin, Java, React native, Flutter)
jobs_results.description:
Junior/Medior Android developer (Kotlin, Java, React native, Flutter)

Budapesti IT fejlesztő csapatunkba keresünk új kollégát Android (Kotlin, Java, React native, Flutter) munkakörbe alkalmazotti munkaviszonyba, heti 2 nap home office lehetőséggel (iroda: József nádor tér 5-6.). Kezdés megbeszélés tárgya, a jó munkaerőre szívesen várunk.

Szegeden és Budapesten rendelkezünk irodával. A projektek Szegeden főleg IT security területhez kapcsolódó kutatás-fejlesztési feladatokat ölelnek fel, valamint sérülékenységvizsgálatot is végzünk partnereink számára. Budapesten piacorientált fejlesztések (Android, .NET, Angular) és mesterséges intelligencia terén is dolgozunk.

Egy tech lead kollégával dolgoznál együtt, így fontos az önállóság.Kiválasztási folyamat egy személyes találkozóból és egy házifeladatból áll amire egy hetetet adunk, és 3 óra az elkészítése.

Fontos a nyitottság a változatos tech stack-re, olyan kollégát szeretnénk felvenni a csapatba, aki nem csak egy adott területen szeretne dolgozni, hanem a változatos projectek miatt nyitott a tanulásra, és új stack használatára is. Android fejlesztési projecteken a megrendelő igényei alapján fejlesztünk (Használt stack: Kotlin, Java, React native, Flutter) nem várjuk el, hogy mindegyikben tapasztalt legyél, de a nyitottság fontos. Az IOS tapasztalat előnynek számít.

Légy érdeklődő az alkalmazás backend oldalának fejlesztésére is, ami .NET vagy Node.js nyelvben is lehet akár.

Projektek: futárszolgálat project, éttermi fizetőrendszer project egyéb bizalmas projectek, amik security területhez is tartoznak.

Elsősorban Kotlin fejlesztőt keresünk, de ha más mobilfejlesztési nyelvekkel (flutter, swift, react-native, stb) van gyakorlatod, és nyitott vagy változatos stack használatára, akkor bármelyikben szerzett tapasztalat megfelelő. Mobil fejlesztőként az elsődleges feladatod a mindennapi fejlesztési munkák elvégzése, de ez a valóságban egy fokkal változatosabb. Egyrészt örömmel fogadjuk ötleteidet a tervezési fázis során, másrészt mivel a fejlesztők világa folyamatosan fejlődik, mi pedig a legújabb technológiákkal dolgozunk, így a legkülönfélébb kérdésekre kell majd megtalálnod a választ. Ehhez természetesen minden támogatást és segítséget megad a tech lead kollégánk.

Elvárás:
• Android alkalmazások fejlesztésében szerzett 1-3 év tapasztalat (akár hobbi projecten is)Magabiztos tapasztalat az alábbiak egyikében, és nyitottság a többi terület elsajátítására: Kotlin, Java, Ionic, React native, Flutter..Android Studio, valamint verziókezelő rendszerek (pl. Git) magabiztos használata
• Restful API-k integrálásában szerzett tapasztalat
• Reszponzív és optimalizált mobilalkalmazások készítése
• Hibakeresési és teljesítményoptimalizálási készségek
• Középszintű angol nyelvtudás (magyar csapat)
• Jó problémamegoldó és analitikus képességgel rendelkezel
• Képes vagy önálló munkavégzésre, kezdeményezőkészség jellemez
• Natív vagy flutter alkalmazások fejlesztésére való nyitottság

Előny:
• Érdeklődés a security terület iránt
• Flutter tapasztalat
• IOS tapasztalat
• .NET tapasztalat

Feladat:
• Android alkalmazások tervezése, fejlesztése és karbantartása
• Az ügyfél- és felhasználói igények alapján történő egyedi megoldások megvalósítása
• Kódolási szabványok és minőségbiztosítási eljárások betartása
• Új technológiák és eszközök bevezetése, tesztelése

Amit ajánlunk:
• Cafetéria (Br. 450.000 Ft/év)
• + 1 havi bónusz
• Egészségbiztosítás
• Egészségpénztár
• Szakmai vizsgák, képzések támogatása anyagilag és időben egyaránt
• Heti 2 nap home office lehetőség
• Csapatépítő programok évi több alkalommal
• Tudásodnak megfelelő versenyképes bérezés

Web: https://gammaorg.hu/

Ha bármi kérdésed van, keress bizalommal: hr@gammaorg.hu

jobs_results.title: Senior Software Engineer - Android
jobs_results.description:
Join Vodafone Hungary and build a better tomorrow!

We are looking for a

Senior Software Engineer - Android

for our Technology Department

#Vodafonelife

At Vodafone, we’re working hard to build a better future. A more connected, inclusive and sustainable world. As a dynamic global community, it's our human spirit, together with technology, that empowers us to achieve this. We challenge and innovate in order to connect people, businesses, and communities across the world. Delighting our customers and earning their loyalty drive us, and we experiment, learn fast and get it done, together.
With us, you can be truly be yourself and belong, share inspiration, embrace new opportunities, thrive, and make a real difference.

Your place in the team

Completes and coordinates mobile application developments within the Android development team. Coordinating the team of medior and junior developers. Analyzing requirements, keeping schedules and supervising activities, contributing to team meetings, troubleshooting development, test and production issues across multiple environments and operating platforms. Supports testing activities and handover to Operation Department. Activities include 3rd line maintenance, issue and incident tracking aligned with SLA’s. Updates knowledge by researching new technologies and software products.

You will be involved in the following tasks

•Designs and implements native mobile application (Android) to support business requirements
•Cooperates with MobileApp Back-end and Test team
•Participates in every aspect of development and implementation, working with end users (product owners) to fully understand business requirements
•Ensures compliance with Vodafone policies and procedures
•Prepares high and low level technical documentation
•Estimates the development effort by requirements and projects
•Works in teams using various development methodologies – agile (SCRUM), waterfall.
•Supports testing activities (functional and non-functional tests in all relevant project phases, including automated front-end testing)
•Investigates and fixes defects and incidents during development and application lifecycle
•Reviews and merges PRs sent in by junior and medior colleagues
•Supports junior colleagues’ learning and development by mentoring and coaching
•Participates in selection of junior colleagues during the hiring process
•Makes minor/major mobile application software architecture-related decisions independently
•Contributes and gives support to business team in publication process of Android mobile application
•Supports DevOps team in CI/CD design, plans, prepares and maintains CI flow for Android

We are looking for you if you have
•IT specific university degree OR developer qualification
•5+ years experience in mobile application development
•Experience in agile development methodologies
•Knowledge of Kotlin language and MVVM, VIPER architecture patterns
•Extensive experience using Android Studio
•Expertise in debugging, building debug builds, create logs with various tools, using proxies to debug integration (eg. Charles or Fiddler)
•Unit testing, including use of mocking frameworks
•Deep knowledge of Network Communication/Integration solutions (SOAP, REST JSON, Swagger)
•Good knowledge of English both spoken and written
•Knowledge of CI/CD supporting tools Bamboo/Jenkins, Docker, Automic, Artifactory, Bitbucket)
•Understanding of Software Development Life Cycle, Test Driven Development, Continuous Integration, Continuous Delivery and DevOps in general.
•Able to identify and re-factor incorrect architectures in unfamiliar codes

What we offer

•Cafeteria package & annual bonus

•Laptop & mobile phone (with unlimited voice and data tariff package)

•Hybrid way of working (working from home / from the office)

•Medicover Health Insurance

•Wellbeing program in the topics of sport, nutrition, relax and help (spiritual support)

•4 paid days leave/year for charity projects

•Other discounts (e.g. sport opportunities, eye-glass allowance)

•Parental policy: we offer 16 weeks fully paid leave and upon returning to work, new parents can work part-time hours for 6 months whilst being paid their full-time salary.

•Learning opportunities (internal trainings and LinkedIn Learning)

•New green, digital headquarter that has almost zero emissions thanks to its solar panels installed to supply the building with renewable energy (11th district)

Get to know us

If you want to know more about us and what we do, then

•visit our website: https://careers.vodafone.com/

•follow our career page on Facebook: www.facebook.com/VodafoneKarrier

Vodafone is committed to attracting, developing and retaining the very best people by offering a motivating and inclusive workplace in which talent is truly recognised and rewarded.

We are committed to promoting Inclusion for All with the belief that diversity plays an important role in the success of our business. We actively encourage everyone to consider becoming a part of our journey.

#vodafonehu

Together we can

jobs_results.title: Senior Android Developer (RxAndroid / RxKotlin)
jobs_results.description:
This a Full Remote job, the offer is available from: Hungary

Why join us?

We are a leading creative engineering company that has the privilege of working with many of the world’s biggest brands and technology leaders. Since founding in 2008, our mission has been to create digital products that have a clear purpose and achieve great results by being well built and easy to use.

We are seeking a Senior Android Developer contractor, proficient in Kotlin, to join a project for a major British media broadcast company. The role requires strong expertise in RxAndroid / RxKotlin for reactive programming, along with media playback experience. Familiarity with Android TV and Fire TV is a plus.

Responsibilities
• Develop and maintain native Android applications using Kotlin.
• Implement reactive programming patterns using RxAndroid / RxKotlin.
• Optimize and enhance media playback functionalities.
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality features.

Requirements
• Extensive experience in Android development using Kotlin.
• Strong proficiency in RxAndroid / RxKotlin.
• Experience with media playback implementation.
• Familiarity with Android TV and Fire TV is an advantage.
• Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.

Location
• You have to live and be eligible to work as a contractor in the UK or in Hungary.

This offer from "UIC Digital" has been enriched by Jobgether.com and got a NaN% flex score.

jobs_results.title: Software Engineer - Android
jobs_results.description:
At One, every moment counts.

Moments when the team connects us, when growth motivates us, when impact inspires us, when recognition pushes us, and when ambition drives us. These moments define our everyday. Everything we do contributes to making the moments we experience truly meaningful.

As part of the 4iG group, our goal is to become Hungary’s leading telecommunications provider. We build on a strong foundation and enrich lives with innovative solutions.

Every moment counts. Make the most of yours. Join us!

Your Place In The Team

Completes mobile application developments within the Android development team. Analyzing requirements, keeping schedules, contributing to team meetings, troubleshooting development, test and production issues across multiple environments and operating platforms. Supports testing activities and handover to Operation Department. Activities include 3rd line maintenance, issue and incident tracking aligned with SLA’s. Updates knowledge by researching new technologies and software products.

You Will Be Involved In The Following Tasks
• designs and implements native mobile application (Android) to support business requirements
• cooperates with MobileApp Back-end and Test team
• participates in every aspect of development and implementation, working with end users (product owners) to fully understand business requirements
• ensures compliance with One policies and procedures
• prepares high and low level technical documentation
• estimates the development effort by requirements and projects
• works in teams using various development methodologies – agile (SCRUM), waterfall
• supports testing activities (functional and non-functional tests in all relevant project phases, including automated front-end testing)
• investigates and fixes defects and incidents during development and application lifecycle
• reviews / cross reviews PRs sent in by junior and medior colleagues
• supports junior colleagues’ learning and development by mentoring and coaching
• makes minor mobile application software architecture-related decisions independently
• supports DevOps team in CI/CD design, plans, prepares and maintains CI flow for Android

We are looking for you, if you have…
• IT specific university degree OR developer qualification
• 2+ years experience in mobile application development
• experience in agile development methodologies, ideally KANBAN
• knowledge of Kotlin language
• extensive experience using Android Studio
• expertise in debugging, building debug builds, create logs with various tools, using proxies to debug integration
• unit testing, including use of mocking frameworks
• knowledge of Network Communication/Integration solutions (REST JSON, Swagger)
• good knowledge of English both spoken and written
• understanding of Software Development Life Cycle, Test Driven Development, Continuous Integration, Continuous Delivery and DevOps in general
• able to identify and re-factor incorrect architectures in unfamiliar codes

What We Offer
• cafeteria package & bonus or comission
• laptop & mobile phone (with unlimited voice and data tariff package)
• hybrid way of working
• corporate Health Insurance (Swiss Clinic)
• employee discounts (e.g. Employee Flotta)
• wellbeing program in the topics of sport, nutrition, relax and help (spiritual support)
• 4 paid days leave/year for charity projects
• other discounts (e.g. AYCM card, eye-glass allowance)
• learning opportunities (internal trainings)

Discover Your Future at One

If you’re ready to learn more about who we are and what we do:
• Visit our website for more insights.
• Follow our career page for updates and opportunities.

At One, we’re dedicated to creating a workplace where every moment counts. Moments when the team connects us, when growth motivates us, when impact inspires us, when recognition pushes us, and when ambition drives us, these moments define who we are.

Every moment counts. Make the most of yours. Join us!

jobs_results.title: Android Engineer, EMEA
jobs_results.description:
Superpedestrian is engineering the future of micromobility. The Superpedestrian team is composed of some of the most talented operations specialists, policy managers, designers and engineers, all focused on transforming the future urban mobility. Our scooters, called LINK, were designed to prioritize safety from the inside out, and our Superpedestrian team is dedicated to building meaningful local and city partnerships across the world. Join us!

We are seeking an Android Developer to join the Superpedestrian consumer software team. The ideal candidate will take a prominent role in pushing our Android app forward. There are currently several opportunities open in the software team so we are looking for candidates at different stages of their career. Don’t hesitate to apply if you only meet some of the preferred qualifications, or if you feel you’re overqualified. This is a position where you will have the opportunity to shape your responsibilities based on the skills you bring to the table.

What you’ll do
• Design and build advanced applications for the Android platform
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design and ship new features
• Unit-test code for robustness, including edge cases, usability and general reliability
• Work on improving application performance and bug fixes
• Continuously discover, evaluate, and implement new technologies to maximize development efficiency and application performance
• Participate in cross-team peer code reviews
• Participate in Agile Scrum sprint and release planning

Who you are
• 3+ years of industry experience in Android development
• 2+ years of Kotlin experience
• Experience with Kotlin coroutines and flows
• Experience with the Android build tooling (Gradle)
• Experience with MVVM Architecture
• Experience integrating apps with server side API
• Experience developing consumer facing apps
• Working knowledge of database systems
• Experience with Bluetooth device integration is a plus

Nice To Have
• Experience with Jetpack Compose
• Experience with Dependency Injection Tools

Perks
• We’re different.
• We are born of engineers, not venture capitalists. Our control centre and test labs are located in Cambridge, Massachusetts, alongside MIT and Harvard University. We have some of the sharpest minds in the industry, and we hold more than 30 patents for our amazing technologies. None of our competitors come close.
• LINK is the result of eight years developing our artificial intelligence-driven safety platform, and two years designing a robust chassis and efficient powertrain to match. We take our time to get our technology, our operations and our recruitment just right, because we think long-term.
• And we’re growing fast. You’ll have the opportunity to shape our company and the way we work, and make a real difference to communities through our services.

Superpedestrian actively encourages applicants of all backgrounds. If you think you meet most of the requirements, but not every single point on the job description, please apply! We’d love to have a chat and see if you’d be a great addition to our team.

Apply here >

jobs_results.title: Senior Android Developer (REF3358Q)
jobs_results.description:
A Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions (korábban IT Services Hungary, ITSH) Magyarország legnagyobb ICT-munkaadója, a Deutsche Telekom Csoport tagja. A 2006-ban alakult, több mint 5000 fős cég az informatikai és telekommunikációs szolgáltatások széles körét nyújtja. A vállalat 2019-ben elnyerte a Nemzeti Befektetési Ügynökség (HIPA) legjobb oktatási együttműködésért járó díját, a PwC Magyarország független felmérése alapján a legvonzóbb magyarországi munkahelyek közé tartozik, és a legetikusabb multinacionális vállalat címét is megkapta. A cég folyamatosan fejleszti négy – budapesti, debreceni, pécsi és szegedi – telephelyét, és várja képzett informatikai szakemberek jelentkezését a csapatába.
Senior Android Developer (REF3358Q)

A Deutsche Telekom MMS GmbH 2019 óta ügyfele és üzleti partnere vállalatunknak és alapvetően a DTAG csoport meghatározó innovációs és digitalizációs szolgáltatója.
A projektünk célja német egészségbiztosító cégeknek és nemzetközi kereskedelmi ügyfeleinknek a szolgáltatásait támogassuk web elemzéssel és személyre szabott megoldásokkal.

Amennyiben szereted a kihívásokkal teli, változatos munkakört, hétköznapjaid az agilis munkavégzés jegyeiben töltöd és szívesen használod a nyelvtudásod a mindennapi kommunikáció során, Te vagy a mi emberünk!

Feladataid lesznek:
• Haladó Android alkalmazások fejlesztése
• Az alkalmazások teljesítményének, minőségének javítása
• Szoros együttműködés a designerekkel és fejlesztőkkel a zökkenőmentes felhasználói élmény érdekében
• Kódfelülvizsgálatokban való részvétel és építő jellegű visszajelzés nyújtása

Elvárások
• Minimum 5+ év Android fejlesztésben
• Tech Stack: Kotlin, Java, Android Studio, Android SDK
• API integrációk és 3rd party library-k használatával való tapasztalat
• Mobil UI/UX tervezési alapelvek és legjobb gyakorlatok ismerete
• Hard skillek: Android Studio, Git, CI/CD, MVVM architektúra, unit testing
• Magabiztos angol nyelvtudás

Előny, de nem feltétel:
• Jetpack Compose tapasztalat
• Kotlin Multiplatform tapasztalat
• Mobil tesztelési tapasztalat
• Ismeretek alkalmazásbolti publikálásról és életciklus menedzsmentről
Munkavégzés helye
Budapest,Debrecen,Pécs,Szeged

jobs_results.title: Senior Android Developer (Relocation to Berlin)
jobs_results.description:
Location: Berlin, office-first. For this role we are looking for candidates who are willing and able to relocate to Berlin.

At SumUp we are building innovative solutions to support small merchants to start, run, and scale their business. We offer a diverse range of products that integrate seamlessly into our user's lives by pushing the boundaries of financial technology. From concept to deployment, you will play a key role in shaping the future of our products.

SumUp has a SuperApp that hosts all of the different products we offer to our merchants - from business accounts to invoicing to managing payments. You’ll be an integral member of our development team, and have the opportunity to contribute to creating groundbreaking mobile applications that set new standards in user experience and functionality.

We take our engineering excellence seriously at SumUp and have exciting opportunities to work with a team of highly skilled engineering experts on customer-facing products such as our Global Bank, Consumer App, Expansion, and many more.

About the team

You'll be able to connect with mobile engineers from all over the company as our initiatives are far-reaching. You’ll experience a wide range of different verticals: maintaining CI/CD for Mobile projects, creating tooling for developers, and providing infrastructure & architecture supporting our modularised codebase.

We maintain a high bar in engineering and aim to continually increase it. Our initiatives have long-term impact at scale. We believe in open communication and constant learning over strict rules. If you're looking for the chance to innovate and help millions of small merchants succeed - join us!

What you’ll do
• In the first few weeks, you'll dive into the code and infrastructure, and get to know our development workflow
• You'll develop major features that impact our developer community
• You'll work closely with the rest of the team to drive our roadmap and design our developer experience
• You'll help us rethink problems we've solved before differently as requirements evolve
• You'll build a wealth of knowledge about our complex problem domain, as well as its implications on the long-term health of our project – and how to manage it cleanly

You'll be great for this position if
• You have experience with Kotlin and the Android framework
• You know what to test, why to test it, and how to write flexible tests that won't break
• You care about user interaction and usability, and have attention to detail
• You love coding and take the time to reflect on all aspects of your implementation, be it the frameworks, languages, or processes
• You strive for clean code but also know how to be pragmatic when needed

Why you should join SumUp
• The opportunity to work on large-scale fintech products used by millions of small businesses around the world
• Relocation support
• Work as part of a cross-functional high-impact squad
• A dedicated annual Learning & Development budget for attending conferences and/or advancing your career through further education
• Enrollment in our virtual stock ownership program - you will own a stake in SumUp’s future success
• A corporate pension scheme
• You'd enjoy other great benefits such as Urban Sports Club subsidy, Kita placement assistance, subsidized office lunches and other location-tailored benefits, Babbel language platform subscription and more
• You’ll attend global offsites and/or hackathons
• Join a truly global SumUp team of + people from 80+ countries, spread across 4 continents

About SumUp

We believe in the everyday hero.

Small business owners are at the heart of all we do, so we create powerful, easy-to-use financial solutions to help them run their businesses. With a founder’s mentality and a 'team-first’ attitude, our diverse teams across Europe, South America and the United States work together to ensure that the small business owners we partner with can be successful doing what they love.

SumUp is an Equal Employment Opportunity employer that proudly pursues and hires a diverse workforce. SumUp does not make hiring or employment decisions on the basis of race, colour, religion or religious belief, ethnic or national origin, nationality, sex, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, disability, age or any other basis protected by applicable laws or prohibited by company policy. SumUp also strives for a healthy and safe workplace and strictly prohibits harassment of any kind.

SumUp will not accept unsolicited resumes from any source other than directly from a candidate.

Job Application Tip

We recognise that candidates feel they need to meet % of the job criteria in order to apply for a job. Please note that this is only a guide. If you don’t tick every box, it’s ok too because it means you have room to learn and develop your career at SumUp.

jobs_results.title: Android Developer (Kotlin) @ Experis Polska
jobs_results.description:
• Min 2 years of software engineering experience as an Android Developer using Kotlin
• Fundamental understanding of the Technical Skills of a Software Engineer through college education
• Working knowledge of basic concepts and procedures

Join the project for our Client which specializes in creating navigation systems such as satellite navigation devices, smartphone navigation apps, GPS sports watches, action cameras, fleet management systems, and other geolocation-based services.

Offer:
• Workplace: 100% remote
• MultiSport Plus
• Group insurance
• Medicover Premium
• e-learning platform

Opis Firmy

Experis to światowy lider rekrutacji specjalistów i kadry zarządzającej w kluczowych obszarach IT. Z nami znajdziesz konkurencyjne oferty zatrudnienia oraz ciekawe projekty IT skierowane zarówno do ekspertów z wieloletnim doświadczeniem, jak i osób, które dopiero zaczynają swoją przygodę w branży IT.

Oferujemy rekrutacje menedżerów i wysoko wykwalifikowanych konsultantów z doświadczeniem w branży IT. Experis jest częścią ManpowerGroup i został uznany za jedną z najbardziej etycznych firm na świecie.
,[Performing a range of mainly straightforward assignments – a significant portion of time is spent writing code to deliver individual component improvements that meet the customers' needs, Providing useful code reviews for changes submitted by others, Using prescribed guidelines or policies to analyze and resolve problems, Making meaningful contributions to their team's design] Requirements: Android, Kotlin Additionally: Sport Subscription, Private healthcare, International projects, Remote work, Employee referral bonus, Life insurance.
